findings.title: AFI - Accumulated Fees Inconsistency
findings.description: Contract resets accumulated fees variables without distributing rewards, causing an inconsistency.

findings.title: RME - Redundant Mapping Entries
findings.description: Redundant code segments that can be optimized for performance and efficiency.
findings.location: Redundant mapping entries in the contract

findings.title: MVN - Misleading Variables Naming
findings.description: Misleading variable names that may lead to confusion, impacting code readability and maintainability.
findings.location: Various functions and variables with misleading names

findings.title: CR - Code Repetition
findings.description: Repetitive code segments that can impact gas efficiency, complexity, readability, security, and maintainability.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables initialized only in the constructor should be declared as immutable for optimization and gas efficiency.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Non-compliance with Solidity naming conventions, impacting code readability and maintainability.
findings.location: Various functions and variables with non-conforming names

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Potential loss of precision due to incorrect order of operations in arithmetic calculations.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: Unlocked pragma version may lead to compatibility issues and unexpected behavior.
